text:
A valuable asset hangs from the ceiling of a large room. Debris and green light surround it. Huh. You're pretty sure this is some sort of trap...
Flip the top [Item] card faceup.

options.optionText: You could get it and out quickly enough... you think? • [A] [L] 4

result.result: Success: You deftly sneak through the room, dodging the land mine, stepping over the tripwire, and grabbing the bait!

options.optionText: Send someone else in for it • Companion
options.result: Yup! Definitely a trap. You step over the corpse of your ex-companion and pocket the bait.

options.optionText: Search a different room
options.result: A trap is a trap is a trap: not worth it.

text: You encounter a rusted and damaged Mister Handy robot. 'Whoah, man. Far out,' it says. It seems to be wandering around aimlessly. There aren't any people around.

options.optionText: Leave the robot and loot the building
options.result: You tell the Mister Handy you're going to enter the building. 'Groovy,' it replies.

options.optionText: Reprogram the robot • [I] [L] 4

result.result: Success: Success! Hmm... 'Defense Protocol' sounds useful. The robot loses its calm demeanor and says, 'Identify target.'
result.aftermath: Choose and kill 1 enemy within 2 spaces

result.result: Fail: You are partway into his systems when you hit some kind of firewall. Suddenly, this Mister Handy is a lot less chill.

text: A few scavengers have gathered their findings and placed them as bets. The first to make it to the far side of the complex and back wins.

options.optionText: Join the race! • [S] [P] [E] [C] [I] [A] [L] 6

result.result: Success: Looking back over the course, you cannot even see your competition. You get your pick of the bets.
result.aftermath: 5 Caps • Choose 1 item from the shop

result.result: Fail: It's probably best to not rehash how that went. With a disparaging smirk, the winner flips you a Cap.

options.optionText: Train the course after they're done
options.result: You don't want to risk anything, but the practice after they're done teaches you a few things.

options.optionText: Hold back and take their stuff
options.result: As soon as they're out of sight, you grab whatever you can and get out of there.

text: You approach a section of the structure that doesn't show much looter activity. You wonder why it's been avoided... until you hear the scuttling.

options.optionText: Rush in and kill the critters
options.result: You step into the den and get ready to clear out the creatures for the good of everyone.

options.optionText: Send them after somone else • Adjacent survivor
options.result: You make sounds to draw the creatures away and toward someone else.

options.optionText: Grab something and run
options.result: Leaping quickly around a corner, you grope blindly in the dark, taking the first thing you touch. Then you turn and sprint out of there.

text: You hear nothing but your own footsteps as you walk through the ruins. It's calm and quiet.

options.optionText: Hack into an old register • [I] 3

result.result: Fail: The computer emits a loud alarm. The sound attracts something outside the building. Guess you're not alone. You grab a Cap lying under the register.

options.optionText: Search for useful equipment • [P] [L] 4

result.result: Success: You find some strange markings near the back of the building. They appear to be pointing to some kind of cache.
Fail: You're reading markings on the wall when something springs from the shadows!

text: There is movement inside the structure. You ready for a fight but relax as a figure appears and hails you with a friendly wave.

options.optionText: Work with her to search for loot • [P] [C] 4

result.result: Success: Working together, you find a good amount of supplies
Fail: 'Found something!' she yells. Walking over you see the fool holding a glowing canister.

options.optionText: She likely has the best loot; kill her
options.result: You greet the stranger with a friendly smile. Then, the moment she turns her back, you attack!

options.optionText: Ask the stranger to join you
options.aftermath:
Reveal [Item] cards until you find a companion; if you meet its requirement, take that card; discard the rest.
Become Idolized

text: As you pick through the ruins, you spot a figure on the ground. As you approach, you see that it's a dead man. He has no weapons or gear. What was he doing out here?

options.optionText: Investigate the corpse
options.result: On the corpse you find a filthy, folded photograph of a man geared for war standing next to a small boy and girl. You can make out bits of a note next to a drawing of a bird: 'I am going east... my greatest regret... ou and Margaret.' Maybe Margaret is still aive?

options.optionText: Ignore the corpse and search • [P] [E] 4

result.result: Success: The wasteland is full of dead men. You'd rather have enough supplies to avoid joining them.
Fail: You hear scuttling as you search. The corpse must have drawn scavengers.

text: You hear nothing but your own footsteps as you walk through the ruins. It's calm and quiet.

options.optionText: Hack into an old register • [I] 3

result.result: Success: Someone has been here before, but you find some Caps near the back of the drawer
Fail: Before you're done, you hear voices drifitng through the ruins. There's something still here.!

options.optionText: Search for useful equipment • [P] [L] 4

result.result: Success: You turn over some rubble to find a corpse! It stinks, but it has some useful items still on it.
Fail: You hear voices drifting through the ruins as you search. There's someone here!
